title: Design tokens + CSS variables cleanup
problem: Colors/spacing/typography are inconsistent across views, causing visual drift and harder maintenance.
done_when: Introduce a small set of design tokens (colors, spacing, radius, shadow, typography) and migrate key UI components to use them consistently.

title: Typography scale + line-height pass
problem: Text sizing varies by screen and component; readability suffers (especially logs/settings).
done_when: Define a consistent type scale (sizes/weights/line-heights) and apply to headings, labels, body, and monospace blocks.

title: Focus states + keyboard navigation audit
problem: Keyboard users can lose focus; focus rings are inconsistent and sometimes invisible in dark mode.
done_when: All interactive elements have clear focus styles; tab order is logical; Esc/Enter behavior is consistent; no focus traps regressions.

title: Button variants + sizing system
problem: Buttons feel inconsistent (padding, icon spacing, disabled state, danger styling).
done_when: Standardize button variants (primary/secondary/ghost/danger) and sizes (sm/md/lg) with consistent icon alignment and disabled/loading states.

title: Form field component redesign
problem: Inputs lack consistent labels/help/errors, making settings/installs harder to scan.
done_when: Introduce a reusable Field component (label, description, hint, error) and migrate primary settings forms.

title: Toast/notification visual redesign
problem: Toasts are easy to miss and visually inconsistent; actions/copy are not standardized.
done_when: Redesign toast layout (title/body/actions), stacking rules, and durations; add consistent “Copy details” affordance.

title: Modal layout standardization
problem: Modals vary in padding, max width, and footer actions; some overflow poorly on small screens.
done_when: Standard modal header/body/footer layout with responsive sizing and consistent action ordering/cancel placement.

title: Empty states with clear CTAs
problem: Empty views look broken; users do not know what to do next.
done_when: Each major view (Nodes/Games/Files/FRP/Panel) has an explicit empty state with primary CTA and short explanation.

title: Skeleton loaders for primary views
problem: Loading flickers between blank states and content; perceived performance is poor.
done_when: Introduce skeleton placeholders for lists/cards (daemons, instances, files, logs) and ensure transitions feel smooth.

title: Sidebar visual refresh
problem: Sidebar spacing and visual hierarchy are cramped; active state is not prominent.
done_when: Refresh sidebar spacing/typography/icons; improve active indicator; tune collapsed state and hover states.

title: Topbar: global search + breadcrumbs
problem: Key navigation actions are buried; users want faster jumps and more context.
done_when: Add a topbar pattern with optional breadcrumbs and a global search/quick switch that works on small screens.

title: Connection/offline indicator redesign
problem: Users cannot easily tell whether data is stale; offline mode is visually subtle.
done_when: Prominent connection badge showing online/offline + last update time; offline mode clearly marked across views.

title: Friendly error screen + recovery actions
problem: Unexpected errors show technical text; no clear next step.
done_when: Standard error boundary UI with “Reload”, “Copy debug info”, and optional “Reset UI state” actions.

title: Settings navigation improvements
problem: Settings are long and hard to scan; search results are not visually highlighted.
done_when: Add section anchors, sticky TOC on wide screens, and highlight matched fields when searching.

title: Command palette polish
problem: Palette actions are useful but discoverability and grouping can be improved.
done_when: Add categories, recent commands, clearer keyboard hints, and better empty state when no match.

title: Tooltip system standardization
problem: Tooltips vary and sometimes overflow; some hints are inaccessible.
done_when: Standard tooltip component with max width, delay, and ARIA; migrate key hint surfaces.

title: Icon sizing/alignment pass
problem: Icons shift baseline and appear inconsistent between buttons and headings.
done_when: Standardize icon sizes and alignment rules (stroke width, baseline) across buttons, tabs, and cards.

title: Table component styling refresh
problem: Lists and tables (files/instances/nodes) are hard to scan at a glance.
done_when: Introduce consistent table styling with sticky header option, row hover, subtle separators, and compact mode.

title: Long list UX: scroll position + range indicators
problem: Virtualized/long lists can feel disorienting; users lose context.
done_when: Add optional range indicator (e.g., 200/1200), preserve scroll position on refresh, and provide “back to top”.

title: Nodes metrics cards redesign
problem: Node CPU/memory/disk info is functional but not visually structured.
done_when: Redesign node metrics into clear cards with icons, units, and consistent color semantics (ok/warn/bad).

title: Graphs: legend/tooltips/time ranges
problem: Graphs lack context; users cannot easily compare CPU/mem over time.
done_when: Add legends, hover tooltips with exact values, and time range selector (e.g., 15m/1h/6h).

title: Games instance list visual refresh
problem: Instance list can be visually busy; important status isn’t prominent.
done_when: Refresh instance list row layout (status pill, version, port, quick actions) with clearer hierarchy and spacing.

title: Games details layout: sticky action bar
problem: Primary actions (Start/Stop/Backup/Restore) can be far from context and require scrolling.
done_when: Introduce a sticky action bar or header region on details view with consistent button grouping.

title: Log viewer: search/filter UI polish
problem: Log search/filter controls are not obvious; highlighting is inconsistent.
done_when: Add a compact search bar, filter chips (ERROR/WARN), and consistent highlighting with jump-to-next.

title: Files breadcrumbs overflow handling
problem: Deep paths overflow and become hard to navigate.
done_when: Breadcrumbs collapse middle segments into an overflow menu; segments are easier to click/tap.

title: Files context menu (right click)
problem: Common file actions require moving to small action buttons; workflow is slow.
done_when: Right-click context menu for common actions (open/rename/move/delete/download/copy path).

title: Editor toolbar redesign
problem: Editing configs/logs lacks helpful controls and consistent layout.
done_when: Add editor toolbar with wrap toggle, line numbers, find/replace, and copy/save actions in a consistent spot.

title: Image preview lightbox UI
problem: Image preview is limited; inspection (zoom/pan) is awkward.
done_when: Add lightbox with zoom/pan, background dimming, and keyboard navigation for images.

title: Confirmation dialogs consistency pass
problem: Destructive confirmations vary by feature; risk of misclick remains.
done_when: Unify confirmation dialog patterns (danger styling, typed confirm when needed, consistent copy) across all destructive actions.

title: Notifications drawer (UI)
problem: Transient toasts are lost; users want a place to review recent actions/errors.
done_when: Add a small notifications drawer that shows recent toasts/events with filtering and “Copy details”.

title: Responsive design audit (mobile/tablet)
problem: Some layouts overflow or require horizontal scroll on smaller screens.
done_when: Audit all views for mobile/tablet; fix overflow; ensure touch targets are >= 44px where applicable.

title: Color contrast audit for all themes
problem: Dark/light/contrast themes may not meet contrast requirements for text and status colors.
done_when: Adjust theme palette so primary text and status colors meet reasonable contrast; verify on common UI surfaces.

title: Motion/transition polish
problem: UI state changes feel abrupt; some transitions are missing.
done_when: Add subtle transitions for modals, drawers, expand/collapse, and list updates without harming performance.

title: Copy-to-clipboard UX consistency
problem: Copy buttons/affordances vary; user feedback is inconsistent.
done_when: Standardize copy buttons with tooltip (“Copied”), optional short label, and consistent placement on cards/rows.

title: Time formatting UX (relative + absolute)
problem: Timestamps are hard to interpret quickly; locale formatting varies.
done_when: Show relative time by default with tooltip or secondary text showing absolute time; respect locale.

title: User menu UI (avatar + security state)
problem: Users cannot quickly see which account is logged in or whether 2FA is enabled.
done_when: Add a user menu (avatar/initials) that shows current user, 2FA status, and shortcuts to sessions/tokens.

title: API tokens UI redesign
problem: Token list is functional but lacks good scanning and safety cues.
done_when: Improve tokens list (name, created/last used, masked display) and add clear revoke affordance.

title: Sessions UI redesign
problem: Session management needs clearer device/IP/time information for security.
done_when: Show sessions in a structured table/card list with current session highlight, IP, user agent summary, created/last seen.

title: Audit log viewer UI
problem: Security/audit events are hard to review without a dedicated UI surface.
done_when: Add an audit log view with filters (action/user/time) and copy/export actions.

title: Onboarding wizard UI (first run)
problem: First-time users are not guided through node token, ports, and basic security.
done_when: Create a first-run wizard that guides through login, node token, install a server, and optional FRP setup.

title: In-app help modal (quickstart + shortcuts)
problem: Users rely on README; discoverability inside the UI is limited.
done_when: Add a help modal with quickstart steps, key shortcuts, and links to docs/security notes.

title: Inline validation UI across forms
problem: Errors appear late or only in toasts; user has to guess what to fix.
done_when: Show inline errors near fields, disable submits when invalid, and provide concise error messages.

title: Settings change preview (diff)
problem: Users fear breaking config because they cannot see what will change.
done_when: Show a lightweight “review changes” diff/summary before applying settings that affect instances/daemon.

title: Theme picker redesign with previews
problem: Theme selection lacks context; users cannot preview contrast quickly.
done_when: Theme picker shows preview swatches/cards and a short note about what each theme optimizes for.

title: ARIA labels + skip link pass
problem: Icon-only buttons are not always labeled; screen reader navigation is suboptimal.
done_when: Add ARIA labels for icon-only controls and a skip-to-content link; verify no redundant labels.

title: Keyboard shortcuts discoverability improvements
problem: Shortcuts exist but users forget; hinting is inconsistent.
done_when: Add consistent shortcut hints on relevant buttons/menus and make cheat sheet easily accessible from UI.

title: Scrollbar styling (dark mode)
problem: Default scrollbars can be low-contrast and visually inconsistent across platforms.
done_when: Add optional scrollbar styling that respects theme and does not harm usability/accessibility.

title: Density toggle (compact/comfortable)
problem: Some users prefer compact lists; others prefer larger touch targets.
done_when: Add UI density toggle that affects list/table padding and card spacing; persist preference in UI prefs.

title: Shareable details views (print-friendly)
problem: Sharing node/game status often requires screenshots; print/export is messy.
done_when: Add a clean, shareable layout for node/game details (minimal chrome, good typography) suitable for screenshot/print.

title: Status badge system standardization
problem: Status chips (online/offline/running/error) use inconsistent colors/shapes.
done_when: Create a unified status badge system (semantic colors, icons, sizes) and apply across Nodes/Games/FRP.
